subprocess_flow.description: Each Development Team member prepares to share their updates by reviewing their progress on assigned tasks and identifying any impediments encountered.
success_criteria: Team members are ready to provide concise updates.

subprocess_flow.description: The Development Team gathers for the Daily Scrum, typically standing up to encourage brevity. The Scrum Master ensures the meeting stays within the 15-minute timebox and focuses on the three key questions.
success_criteria: The team gathers promptly for the Daily Scrum.

subprocess_flow.description: Each Development Team member answers the first question: What specific tasks did I accomplish yesterday that contributed to the Sprint Goal? Updates should be concise and focused on completed work.
success_criteria: Each team member shares their accomplishments from the previous day.

subprocess_flow.description: Each Development Team member answers the second question: What tasks will I focus on today to move closer to achieving the Sprint Goal? Plans should be realistic and aligned with the Sprint Backlog.
success_criteria: Each team member shares their plan for the current day.

subprocess_flow.description: Each Development Team member answers the third question: Are there any impediments currently hindering my progress or blocking me from completing my tasks? Impediments should be clearly identified and articulated.
success_criteria: Any impediments are identified and clearly stated.

subprocess_flow.description: The Scrum Master captures all identified impediments and assigns ownership for resolution. This ensures that no impediment is overlooked and that someone is responsible for addressing it.
success_criteria: All impediments are recorded and assigned for resolution.

subprocess_flow.description: If necessary, team members engage in brief discussions to clarify points or offer assistance. However, detailed problem-solving is deferred to after the Daily Scrum to maintain the timebox.
success_criteria: Issues are clarified without exceeding the timebox.

subprocess_flow.description: The Scrum Master takes immediate action to remove any identified impediments, escalating as necessary. The goal is to keep the Development Team focused and productive.
success_criteria: Impediments are actively addressed and resolved in a timely manner.
